CustomField.formula: IF ( Open_Places__c >0 ,IF (DATEVALUE( Class_Date__c ) <> TODAY(), HYPERLINK("/pilates/a0D/e?&CF00N900000069qlT="&$User.FirstName+" "+$User.LastName&"&CF00N900000069qlT_lkid="&$User.SFDC_Account_Id__c&"&CF00N90000004zXhY_lkid="&Id&"&CF00N90000004zXhY="&Name&"&saveURL=%2F"&Id&"&retURL=/pilates/a0B","Register Now"), "Class is today, phone us to book"), "Full")
CustomField.label: Register Now
